comments: She doesnt really teach you anything you need to know. 99% of what you need to know, you have to teach yourself with the book. I would not really recommend this class unless you like hearing her talk about herself and teaching yourself everything you need to know.

This class was super easy. All you need to do is study for the test and take notes. You definitely need the book. There were a couple of time consuming assignments, but she gives so many chances for extra credit that there is no reason you can\'t get an A.
Horrible teacher, annoying, and boring! do not take her class if you are trying to get your gpa up.

Very confusing and doesn\'t cut any breaks. Mandatory attendance and if you have more than one unexcused absence she drops your grade one letter for every unexcused absence there after. She acts like her class is the only one you are taking and overloads you with pointless projects. This is the only class I have ever made a D in.
New at teaching. I am always more confused by the time she is finished talking and she knows that we are all confused and still won\'t cut any breaks!
